);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE participants (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(50)
);


CREATE TABLE trial_results (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT NOT NULL,
  participant_id INT NOT NULL,
  result TEXT,
  result_date DATE
);

### STATEMENT

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE trials (
  trial_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  lead_researcher VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE results (
  result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT REFERENCES trials(trial_id),
  participant_id INT REFERENCES participants(participant_id),
  result_description TEXT,
  result_date DATE
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE participants SET age = 30 WHERE name = 'Alice';
